Package org.matsim.core.scoring.functions Description

Contains the scoring functions, i.e. the implementations of ScoringFunctionFactory, used in the project. The classes ending with Scoring (and not with ScoringFunction) are "sum terms" which you can use independently when you write your own ScoringFunction, see SumScoringFunction. On the other hand, it may be more straight-forward to just implement ScoringFunction yourself and copy/paste some of the math to your own class.
See Also:
org.matsim.core.scoring
